amendment.description: To provide for the closure of Umatilla Army Chemical Depot, Oregon.

vote.text: Amendment SA 570 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 570 proposed by Senator Wyden. (consideration: CR S4665; text as modified: CR S4665) To provide for the closure of Umatilla Army Chemical Depot, Oregon.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 570 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 570 proposed by Senator Wyden.
